DataElement.preferredName: Enzyme Induction Anticonvulsant Therapy Discontinue 10 Days Prior To Study Start Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not the patient is receiving enzyme-inducing anticonvulsant drugs and if so, has been off of them for 10 days prior to study start.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Enzyme Induction Anticonvulsant Therapy Discontinue 10 Days Prior To Start Study
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Enzyme Induction involves initiation of function of a biological molecule that possesses catalytic activity._Drug treatment to prevent, stop, or reduce the severity of seizures or convulsions, commonly used in cases of epilepsy or other seizure disorders._To stop or end, permanently or temporarily._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::10_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Earlier in time or order._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Enzyme Induction involves initiation of function of a biological molecule (usually protein, RNA, or DNA) that possesses catalytic activity.:Drug treatment to prevent, stop, or reduce the severity of seizures or convulsions, commonly used in cases of epilepsy or other seizure disorders.

Concepts.definition: Enzyme Induction involves initiation of function of a biological molecule that possesses catalytic activity.
Drug treatment to prevent, stop, or reduce the severity of seizures or convulsions, commonly used in cases of epilepsy or other seizure disorders.

Property.preferredName: Discontinued Integer::10 Day Prior Begin Clinical Study
Property.preferredDefinition: Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::10:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :Earlier in time or order.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.

Concepts.definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If the patient is receiving e
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is receiving enzyme-inducing anticonvulsant drugs, has the patient been off of them for 10 days prior to study start?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC 1302
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient has been previously treated with EIAED, has the patient been off the EIAED for 10 days or more prior to the first dose of lapatinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC 1601
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received enzyme-inducing anticonvulsant drugs in the last 10 days?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC 1602
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received enzyme-inducing anticonvulsant drugs in the 10 days prior to start date of treatment?
